Package it.polimi.ingsw.charactercards

Class StudentMoverCharacterCardTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.charactercards.StudentMoverCharacterCardTest
class StudentMoverCharacterCardTest extends Object
StudentMoverCharacterCardTest tests the StudentMoverCharacterCards

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentMoverCharacterCardTest

      StudentMoverCharacterCardTest()

  • Method Details

    • initialization

      @BeforeEach public void initialization()
      Method initialization() creates an istance of every Character that has an effect on moving students. These istances are saved in a List called StudentMoverCards. This method is called before each test is called

    • availableTest

      @Test public void availableTest()
      Method availableTest() tests, for every element in studentMoverCards, the isAvailable() method. A true return is expected

    • costTest

      @Test public void costTest()
      Method tests the initial cost of every CharacterCard contained in studentMoverCards. The cost is expected to be equal to the initialCost of the CharacterID associated to the CharacterCard.

    • increaseCostTest

      @Test public void increaseCostTest()
      Method tests the ability to increase the cost of the CharacterCard. The cost is expected to be increased by one after the method increaseCost() is called.

    • createPlayers

      public it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player[] createPlayers()
      Method creates an array of Players. This methods serves as a shortcut for some tests.
      Returns:
      array of Players

    • influenceTest

      @Test public void influenceTest()
      Method tests the effectInfluence() method for every CharacterCard contained in studentMoverCards they should have no effect on the influence calculation The resulting array is expected to be an array of 0s, for every CharacterCard

    • stepsMotherNatureTest

      @Test public void stepsMotherNatureTest()
      Method tests effectMotherNature() method. effectMotherNature() is expected to return 0.

    • effectPlayerProfessor

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void effectPlayerProfessor(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method effectProfessorTest() tests the outcome of calling effectPlayerProfessor on a influenceCharacterCard class. The expected result is that a player has to have greater students than any other player.

    • initialEffectTest

      @ParameterizedTest @ValueSource(ints={2,3}) public void initialEffectTest(int numOfPlayers)
      Method initialEffectTest() tests the method applyInitialEffect() for both 2 and 3 players game. A true return is expected.

    • applyTest1

      @Test public void applyTest1()
      Method applyTest1() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, Island island). The method is expected to return false

    • applyTest2Monk

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void applyTest2Monk(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method applyTest2Monk() tests the applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is MONK. The method has to move a student, present on the Monk card to a chosen Island Is expected that the chosen student, if it is present on the Monk card, is added on the island A true result is expected
      Parameters:
      clan - is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the effect

    • applyTest2MonkStudentNotOnTheCard

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void applyTest2MonkStudentNotOnTheCard(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method applyTest2Monk() tests the applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is MONK and moving a student who is not on the card Is expected a false return
      Parameters:
      clan - is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the effect

    • applyTest2Jester

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void applyTest2Jester(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method applyTest2Jester() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is Jester. Is expected a true result and that the chosen students are moved in the player's hall
      Parameters:
      clan - is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the effect

    • applyTest2Minstrel

      @Test public void applyTest2Minstrel()
      Method applyTest2Minstrel() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is Minstrel. Is expected a true result and that the chosen students are moved from the hall to the chamber, and from the chamber to the hall

    • applyTestLimitCase1

      @Test public void applyTestLimitCase1()
      Method applyTestLimitCase1 tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is Minstrel if the chamber is empty. Is expected a false result, none of the selected student is moved.

    • applyTestLimitCase2

      @Test public void applyTestLimitCase2()
      Method applyTestLimitCase1 tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is Minstrel if the chamber is full. Is expected a false result, none of the selected student is moved.

    • applyTest2Princess

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void applyTest2Princess(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method applyTest2Princess() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is Princess. Is expected a true result and that the chosen student is moved from the card to the chamber.
      Parameters:
      clan - is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the effect

    • applyTest2Thief

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void applyTest2Thief(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method applyTest2Thief() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2) when the CharacterID is Thief. Is expected a true result and that the for each student 3 students, if present, belonging to a specific clan, are removed from each room. It is expected that if a player has fewer than three students, all he has is removed.
      Parameters:
      clan - is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the effect

    • setGame

      public void setGame()
      This method set the game. It is a shortcut for some tests
